title: TestPriceProvider and environment-based provider selection
description:
attached_molecule: as-wisp-148
attached_at: 2026-02-15T02:35:39Z
attached_args: SKIP PLAN MODE. Implement TestPriceProvider and environment-based provider selection directly.
dispatched_by: mayor

Add testnet support to AssetValuator. 1) Create src/providers/test-price-provider.ts implementing PriceProvider with deterministic prices (ETH=2000, SOL=100, USDC/USDT=1, BTC=40000). Never calls external APIs. 2) Add optional environment parameter to AssetValuator constructor. 3) Provider selection: production/testnet→DecentralizedAggregator (real prices), local→TestPriceProvider (deterministic). 4) Add environment prefix to all cache keys.

title: E2E: migrate Jest to Vitest, add pricing E2E tests
description:
attached_molecule: as-wisp-xvv
attached_at: 2026-02-15T05:43:01Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Enterprise E2E strategy (enterprise-arch/e2e-testing-strategy.md) requires AssetValuator to:

Phase 1 — Framework migration (prerequisite):
1. Migrate from Jest 30.0.5 to Vitest 3.2.4 (enterprise consistency requirement)
2. Convert all existing Jest tests to Vitest syntax
3. Ensure all existing tests still pass after migration

Phase 2 — Add E2E tests:
4. Create vitest.e2e.config.ts with node env, 15s timeout, 2 retries
5. Implement scenarios: price fetch for known asset (P0), batch price fetch (P1), currency conversion (P1), API unavailable fallback (P1), stale price detection (P2)
6. Use recorded API responses for CI, allow live calls for nightly runs
7. Standardize npm script: test:e2e
8. Document E2E strategy in repo ARCHITECTURE.md
9. All tests must pass: npm run build && npm test && npm run test:e2e
